content.body: The spec shows <strong> being used inside of a caption (https://html.spec.whatwg.org/#table-descriptions-techniques). Is that semantically correct? Would <b> be better?
Huh, yeah, I don't think that's really strongly emphasizing the first line, it's just giving it a distinctive style to separate it from the following text. `<b>` might indeed be better there.
content.formatted_body: Huh, yeah, I don't think that's really strongly emphasizing the first line, it's just giving it a distinctive style to separate it from the following text. <b> might indeed be better there.
